summary: Cannot verify that the specified Team section <h2> was removed because the diff for AboutPage.tsx is truncated before the Team section. Additionally, the diff includes updates to project metadata/summaries that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: On the About page, delete the selected H2 element entirely (not just its text) at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[3]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/h2[1] (the H2 within the Team section header block in frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided diff for frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx is truncated and does not include the Team section JSX where the target <h2> would appear, so there is no evidence in the diff summary that the element was removed.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/state metadata (new_feature_requests entries AR-1/AR-2, known_issues, isFixRequest, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for a frontend JSX DOM removal in AboutPage.tsx and explicitly disallows backend changes; it does not request changes to project_state.json metadata.
The BuildRequest does not request documentation or summary file updates; only removal of a specific H2 element in AboutPage.tsx.
